summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of portfolio updates including status changes, mobile navigation, ID card formatting, and particle effects

ui_bugs.issue: Visual spacing between RAJAT and KURDEKAR not showing despite proper HTML structure with mx-2/mx-3 spacing element
ui_bugs.details: HTML shows correct structure: RAJATKURDEKAR but visual spacing may not be rendered properly

passed_tests: Hero section shows ACTIVE status (not AVAILABLE FOR WORK)
Resume button successfully removed from navbar
Mobile view shows RK logo instead of MENU button
Featured Projects header visible on mobile in works section
Particle effects system active on desktop click
Responsive design working across desktop and mobile viewports
ID Card displays correct information and layout
success_percentage: 90% frontend - Most features working correctly with one minor visual spacing issue
action_item_for_main_agent: Verify that Tailwind CSS classes mx-2 md:mx-3 are being applied correctly for spacing between RAJAT and KURDEKAR in the ID card name display. The HTML structure is correct but visual spacing may need CSS inspection.
